comments:
Run an external tool (such as TextPad) in the foreground
With that tool still running, change selection in the LCD to an Ant build 
launch configuration...the dialog re-enables (sortof).

After cancelling the build in progress, the LCD is broken:
cannot change tabs, buttons show as enabled but do not respond to clicks etc.

An interesting side effect is that if you launch the textpad external tool 
again and hit cancel ALL of the tools are terminated.

As well you get:
org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertionFailedException: Assertion failed:
